page.title: 07CONSERVATION_LILLESHALL AREA
page.content: {Wrekin District Council}is responsible for the general upkeep of the area, caring for grass verges, playing fields etc. Some{local farmers have planted {conifers and hard woods}to replace trees removed to make way for big machinery. Along our playing field{The Local {Community Assoc.}helped by{C.P.R.E. have planted a number of hard and semi_hardwood trees. Approx. 7% of people surveyed have garden ponds to attract insects and to keep fish. 38% have bird baths, tables etc.Local{Cub/Scouts}have held a Sponsored Litter pick and{Brownies}and {Guides}work for a{Conservation Badge.{
